reviewText: This will be my third copy of this wonderfully beautiful film. Gave one away and the other is showing wear though still okay. The scenery is gorgeous and peaceful. the bald eagles and other wildlife are wonderful. As I love snow the falling flakes are my favorites but what pulls it all together is the classical music, Tchaikovsky's the Nutcracker, Vivaldi's winter suite, Bach's Sinfonia in G, etc. Do so wish they would reissue it on DVD
